articles.author: Derek Gatopoulos
articles.title: Greek coast guard defends actions as more than 500 migrants heading for Europe feared dead in wreck - The Associated Press
articles.description: ATHENS, Greece (AP) — The Greek coast guard on Friday defended its response to a ship that went down off the country's south coast and left more than 500 migrants  presumed drowned.
articles.content: ATHENS, Greece (AP) The Greek coast guard on Friday defended its response to a ship that went down off the countrys south coast and left more than 500 migrants presumed drowned. Criticism mounted ove… [+6454 chars]

articles.author: Sanjay Dutta
articles.title: IEA: 80% Russian oil exports went to India, China in May - Times of India
articles.description: India News: India and China guzzled almost 80% of Russian crude exports in May as the global oil flow changed direction under G7 and European energy curbs on Mosc
